title: Call of Duty 2 - Multiplayer Crack (MAC)
description:
Created by Keddyfish
-------------------------------------

-100% Works (tested)
-Easy and Noob Proof

-------------------------------------

Installation

1. Double Click DMG
2. Open up the Disk Image called "CoD 2 - MC"
3. Open up the "CoD2 MC" App
4. Drag and Drop the "Call of Duty Multiplayer" App in the Box
5. Select your version of the game (most likely 2.1.3)
6. Click the "Crack" button and wait for the Console to say "Ready for Crack..."
7. Click the "Crack CoD 2 Multiplayer" button
8. Wait 2 Minutes (MAX) then restart computer
9. Start up Call of Duty 2 Multiplayer and you will have access to all servers

-------------------------------------

WARNING: It is VERY important that you get your versions right (did you or did you not install the patch) and make sure you leave the black window with the progress bar open, ALL THE WAY THROUGH THE PROCESS!

Note: For this, you need Call of Duty 2 installed.
